column26: 12011 Waterside View Dr. Apt 24 Reston Va 20194

column10: This is a very dangerous intersection, I walk my child to the children’s center on a daily basis and cars do not stop at the long crosswalk while crossing with a stroller. This has happened numerous times to numerous parents. Flashing lights are needed.; Cars,speeding,on,New,Dominion,Pkwy.,and,Explorer,St.,,right,in,front,of,a,Children’s,center.,Cars,do,not,stop,while,parents,are,crossing,with,stroller.,It,is,a,very,dangerous,intersection,and,there,needs,to,be,flashing,lights,for,the,crosswalk.

Car speeding through clearly marked crosswalk.  I had to stop in the middle of the crosswalk with a stroller in order to not get hit, There needs to more signs/flashing lights as this is extremely dangerous and lots of parents with kids cross here!; New,Dominion,Pkwy.,&,Explorer,St.,,,clearly,marked,crosswalk,(Reston,,VA); Car,speeding,through,clearly,marked,crosswalk,as,I,was,walking,my,toddler,to,the,Children's,Center,with,a,stroller.
This is a consistent problem when families are walking their children to the daycare center. Nobody stops in the crosswalk. Ever!
